commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
<script lang="jsx">
	export default {
		name: 'Space',
		props: {
			align: {
				type: String,
				default: 'flex-start'
			},
			vertical: {
				type: Boolean,
				default: false
			},
			size: {
				type: [Number, String],
				default: 8
			}
		},
		render(createElement) {
			const vnodeList = this.$slots.default.map((x) => {
				return createElement(
					'div',
					{
						style: {
							display: 'inline-block',
							[this.vertical ? 'margin-bottom' : 'margin-right']: `${this.size}px`
						}
					},
					[x]
				);
			});

			return createElement(
				'div',
				{
					class: {
						space: true
					},
					style: {
						flexDirection: this.vertical ? 'column' : 'row',
						alignItems: this.vertical ? this.align : 'center',
						justifyContent: this.vertical ? 'space-between' : this.align
					}
				},
				vnodeList
			);
		}
	};
</script>
<style lang="sass" scoped>
	.space {
		display: flex;
		align-items: center;
		justify-content: space-between;
		flex-wrap: nowrap;

		& :last-child {
			margin-right: 0 !important;
		}
	}
</style>
